reviews.name: Omron Tri-Axis Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: Seems to work pretty well and is a simple and inexpensive way to keep track of your steps and distance. Input the length of your stride and set the time to start it off. Auto-resets each day, which is a nice feature.
reviews.title: Simple inexpensive pedometer

reviews.name: Omron Tri-Axis Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: This is very easy to use. Anyone can figure it out. It gives you the results accurately. It tracks your steps so it gives you the incentive to get up and move around. It has a clip which does come off if you don't pay attention. It's a good price and reasonable if you want to track your steps.
reviews.title: Worth your money!

reviews.name: Omron Tri-Axis Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: small and accurately counts steps, directions are easy to read and follow, so the set up is no problem. overall this is an excellent device that inspires me to keep moving.
reviews.title: Great Device

reviews.name: Omron Tri-Axis Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a Step Challenge at work, and it's very accurate. The challenge is over at work, and I'm still using it to count my steps. I have lost 11lbs since doing this challenge, and using this product. I love it.
reviews.title: Excellent Buy

reviews.name: Omron Tri-Axis Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: The setup on this product is not as easy as other pedometers that I have used. I really liked using it once I got it set up and it seemed very accurate. One tip would be to read the instructions before you try to set this product up.
reviews.title: Good Product
